casebody.data:
Michael INZITARI
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided September 20, 2017

Mary A. Beattie, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

The petitioner Michael Inzitari's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 173 Conn.App. 903, 160 A.3d 1132 (2017), is denied.
